# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $100. Considering your appreciation for the product, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $95. This is a fantastic chance to secure a high-quality item at a reasonable discount. I trust you'll find the product to be well worth the investment. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
